name: Dreamer
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good and 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.
howToRun: Each night, the Dreamer points to a player (not themselves or Travellers). Show the Dreamer 1 good character token and 1 evil character token - one of these is the character of the chosen player, the other is not.
